name: .VAO-PATCH File Extension
summary: Learn about .VAO-PATCH files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To apply a VAO-PATCH file to an Assetto Corsa track or car, you must have installed the player-created Content Manager and the Custom Shaders Patch. Then, you must place your VAO-PATCH file in Assetto Corsa's assettocorsa/​extension/​vao-patches directory. After you do, the VAO patches should be selectable from the Custom Shader Patch's TRACKS VAO menu. For more detailed instructions, refer to this player-created guide.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
